com.variant.share.schema

Interface StateVariant


  • public interface StateVariant
    Representation of the /variations[]/onState/variations[] array element.
    Since:
    0.5

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Variation.Experience> getConjointExperiences()
      The list of this variant's conjointly concurrent experiences, i.e.
      Variation.Experience getExperience()
      This variant's proper experience, i.e.
      Variation.OnState getOnState()
      The Variation.OnState object this variant belongs to.
      java.util.Optional<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getParameters()
      This variant's declared state parameter.
      State getState()
      The state for which this variant is defined.
      Variation getVariation()
      The variation for which this variant is defined.
      boolean isProper()
      Is this a proper variant? A shorthand for getConjointExperiences().isEmpty().

    • Method Detail

      • getOnState

        Variation.OnState getOnState()
        The Variation.OnState object this variant belongs to.
        Returns:
        An object of type Variation.OnState.
        Since:
        0.5

      • getState

        State getState()
        The state for which this variant is defined. Equivalent to getOnState().getState().
        Returns:
        A object of type State
        Since:
        0.6

      • getVariation

        Variation getVariation()
        The variation for which this variant is defined. Equivalent to getOnState().getVariation().
        Returns:
        A object of type Variation
        Since:
        0.5

      • getExperience

        Variation.Experience getExperience()
        This variant's proper experience, i.e. the one from the containing variation.
        Returns:
        An object of type Variation.Experience.
        Since:
        0.5

      • getConjointExperiences

        java.util.List<Variation.Experience> getConjointExperiences()
        The list of this variant's conjointly concurrent experiences, i.e. the ones defined in the conjointVariationRefs clause of the containing variation.
        Returns:
        A list of objects of type Variation.Experience, which will be empty if this variation does not have the conjointVariationRefs clause;
        Since:
        0.5

      • isProper

        boolean isProper()
        Is this a proper variant? A shorthand for getConjointExperiences().isEmpty().
        Returns:
        true if this state variant does not have a conjointVariationRefs, i.e. refers to the containing variation only.
        Since:
        0.6

      • getParameters

        java.util.Optional<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getParameters()
        This variant's declared state parameter.
        Returns:
        Immutable map containing all parameters defined by this state variant.
        Since:
        0.5
